statements: DELETE FROM criminal_records WHERE crime = 'Theft' AND officer_name = 'Officer Smith';
DELETE FROM criminal_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND arrest_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM criminal_records WHERE crime = 'Robbery' AND officer_name = 'Detective Johnson';
DELETE FROM suspects WHERE criminal_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM investigation_logs WHERE officer_name = 'John Doe' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM criminals WHERE id = 101 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM cases WHERE case_id = 201 OR status = 'Open';
